title: Each mode have different pings? Please help
body:
Hi,

I dont have the best internet neither the worst but i play most of the time with 70 ms up to 80 ms max

But lately im having this weird issue where some RANKED games turn from 70 ms to 1000 ms for no reason.

Immediately after the game where i had 1000 ms for 20 min+ i try playing normal or practice mode and i get 70 ms.

My question is..is there different servers or whatever for each mode ? And how to fix this ? as from my side everything is pretty good.

PS: I run this "ping 104.160.141.3 -t" before every game to make sure im having 70 ms

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having some kind of issue like packet loss degrading your match  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a better overview, as your connection to the game server might be falling apart over time.

If the logs to result in packet loss or other major issues, you'll want to use the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
